name: Cracked 2018 Wide & Trimmed
description:
Trim the fat from the new redesign of cracked.com. Removed right column, ads, and most social media buttons.

Combine with my Cracked 2018 Dark Style for a snazzy new look!
additional_info: I highly suggest adding Reek's Anti-Adblock list to your Adblock filters. I have ads hardblocked, so I might not catch them all. I highly suggest uBlock or any other adblocker, as Cracked is littered with ads and trackers that slow their pages to a crawl! --2018-- Aug 14 - Small fix July 24 - Updates May 29 - Made some fixes. Don't know how much longer I will suport this style. Cracked is a dumpsterfire these days. --2017-- Nov 23 - Tweaks. Nov 15 - Tweaks and fixes. Nov 14 - Did a complete re-write!!! Looks like they finally got someone good coding the site over there, so its much easier and sleek. Also made a sexy new dark style that can be combined with this! Check it out! August 22 - Minor fix. March 16 - First update in a while, fixed a minor bug on the comments section width. I also made article images larger, since they are often so tiny. --2016-- June 16 - Minor fix for navbar width issue. Background gradient updated for better autopaging. June 1 - Fixed scrolling issue. May 28 - Minor fix added for comment boxes. May 16 - Minor fix. March 26 - Fixed Blog section. Will have more/better fixes soon. They are mucking up the website right now. March 25 - Fixed Photoplasty section. Feb 18 - A few tweaks. --2015-- June 19 - Redid the whole sheet. Allowed sidebars on all pages but articles, for easier navigation (mostly for videos). Restored the favorite button on articles. Left one little strip for social media at the bottom of the article page. June 20 - Still fishing for ads to add to the filter list and making tweaks. Cracked was coded by insane monkeys, even the front page alone seems to use three different styles, that seem to load at complete random, so may take me a bit while to get the kinks out. July 8 - No more "Sign up for newsletter" popups. If you want to sign up, just check the footer. July 9 - Set a maximum width on the front page, for site uniformity. Disabled all iframes except for videos, this should help block tracking and advertising. Other tweaks. July 11 - A few frontpage tweaks, mostly for mobile devices. July 12 - More tweaks. Disabled background adclicks, for those who don't use adblock for some crazy reason. Videos properly sized. July 29 - Minor ad filter update. Sept 1 - Minor tweaks. Sept 11 - Never Forget! More minor tweaks.
